name: The Park (itch) (Falcon)
description:
You are a ghost hunter. A demolition company want to hire you to hunt the ghost in the famous abandoned park. Your task is to collect all 6 seal pieces to seal the ghost.

Use your flashlight to show your way or reveal the ghost position. If you’re chase by the ghost use the flare that you bring to scare it off. You’re not alone, you bring your pet dog with you. He will alert if the ghost nearby or follow the ghost. But don’t loose him cause it might be the last ghost hunt case he will be with you.

This game was a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 (the dev submitted to slow :(( ).  Special thanks to Canios for the cool tile assets check it out here.
